name: Tornadus
description: The Cyclone Pokémon. Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon can move to the top of initiative order in a single round, but must use a status-affecting move on its turn.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.
